attributes.title: Terrible App Do Not Download
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get updates about the campaign but as soon as I opened it my phone kept completely crashing and I kept receiving messages from unknown callers trying to scam me. I feel like the app is also collecting all of my data and I am extremely worried that I may need to get a new phone.  Do not download this app!!!
